blocks.text:
4 important objects in script:
        Document: <html> … </html>
        Window (current window or tab)
        Style (all css properties of an object
        Navigator (the web browser, ex. Firefox, chrome, includes languages unique to them)

Dom 0 Weak JS - was dependent on the position
	Ex. document.images[0]
	Document.links[1]
	Document.forms[3]
		[x] x was the item number in the html
	Basic variation, most people will know
	Simple, fast, used everywhere

Dom 1/2/3:

Ex: document.getElementById
	W3c (MIT group)
	Some people will know
jQuery

What dom is document.f.q.focus()? (good for quiz)
    Dom 0 -> find something in the document called f and going there find q then focus on it
<script src="bcit.js"></script> //don't put anything between those tags
<script defer='defer'></script> //load the script after everything else is loaded
